name: Chrome Side Table
description: The Chrome Side Table features a minimalist cylinder shape. With cues from the 1970's revival aesthetic, it has a contemporary cylinder silhouette, making it ideal for smaller spaces. This durable drum-like shape offers a solid option for those looking to incorporate a touch of masculine design into their space. The polished chrome pays homage to architectural design, and it can be used within a living space or as a bedside table. The table is also available in burl wood.
